00030 static dfsch_object_t* native_thread_create(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00031                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00032   dfsch_object_t* function;
00033   dfsch_object_t* arguments;
00034   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, function);
00035   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, arguments, NULL);
00036   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00037 
00038   return dfsch_thread_create(function, arguments);
00039 }
00040 
00041 static dfsch_object_t* native_thread_join(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00042                                           dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00043   dfsch_object_t* thread;
00044   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, thread);
00045   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00046 
00047   return dfsch_thread_join(thread);
00048 }
00049 static dfsch_object_t* native_thread_detach(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00050                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00051   dfsch_object_t* thread;
00052   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, thread);
00053   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00054 
00055   dfsch_thread_detach(thread);
00056   return thread;
00057 }
00058 static dfsch_object_t* native_thread_self(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00059                                           dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00060   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00061 
00062   return dfsch_thread_self();
00063 }

00065 static dfsch_object_t* native_mutex_create(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00066                                            dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00067   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00068 
00069   return dfsch_mutex_create();
00070 }
00071 static dfsch_object_t* native_mutex_lock(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00072                                          dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00073   dfsch_object_t* mutex;
00074   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, mutex);
00075   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00076 
00077   dfsch_mutex_lock(mutex);
00078   return mutex;
00079 }
00080 static dfsch_object_t* native_mutex_trylock(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00081                                          dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00082   dfsch_object_t* mutex;
00083   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, mutex);
00084   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00085 
00086   return dfsch_bool(dfsch_mutex_trylock(mutex));
00087 }
00088 static dfsch_object_t* native_mutex_unlock(void*baton, dfsch_object_t* args, 
00089                                            dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00090   dfsch_object_t* mutex;
00091   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, mutex);
00092   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00093 
00094   dfsch_mutex_unlock(mutex);
00095   return mutex;
00096 }
00097 static dfsch_object_t* native_condition_create(void*baton, 
00098                                                dfsch_object_t* args, 
00099                                                dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00100   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00101 
00102   return dfsch_condition_create();
00103 }
00104 static dfsch_object_t* native_condition_wait(void*baton, 
00105                                              dfsch_object_t* args, 
00106                                              dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00107   dfsch_object_t* cond;
00108   dfsch_object_t* mutex;
00109   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, cond);
00110   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, mutex);
00111   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00112 
00113   dfsch_condition_wait(cond, mutex);
00114   return cond;
00115 }
00116 static dfsch_object_t* native_condition_signal(void*baton, 
00117                                                dfsch_object_t* args, 
00118                                                dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00119   dfsch_object_t* cond;
00120   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, cond);
00121   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00122 
00123   dfsch_condition_signal(cond);
00124   return cond;
00125 }
00126 static dfsch_object_t* native_condition_broadcast(void*baton, 
00127                                                   dfsch_object_t* args, 
00128                                                   dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00129   dfsch_object_t* cond;
00130   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, cond);
00131   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00132 
00133   dfsch_condition_broadcast(cond);
00134   return cond;

00137 static dfsch_object_t* native_channel_create(void*baton, 
00138                                              dfsch_object_t* args, 
00139                                              dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00140   size_t buffer;
00141   DFSCH_LONG_ARG_OPT(args, buffer, 16);
00142   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00143 
00144   return dfsch_channel_create(buffer);
00145 }
00146 static dfsch_object_t* native_channel_read(void*baton, 
00147                                            dfsch_object_t* args, 
00148                                            dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00149   dfsch_object_t* channel;
00150   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, channel);
00151   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00152 
00153   return dfsch_channel_read(channel);
00154 }
00155 static dfsch_object_t* native_channel_write(void*baton, 
00156                                             dfsch_object_t* args, 
00157                                             dfsch_tail_escape_t* esc){
00158   dfsch_object_t* channel;
00159   dfsch_object_t* object;
00160   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, channel);
00161   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, object);
00162   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00163 
00164   dfsch_channel_write(channel, object);
00165  
00166   return object;
00167 }

00171 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_module_threads_register(dfsch_object_t *ctx){
00172   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "thread:create", 
00173                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_thread_create,NULL));
00174   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "thread:join", 
00175                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_thread_join,NULL));
00176   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "thread:detach", 
00177                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_thread_detach,NULL));
00178   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "thread:self", 
00179                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_thread_self,NULL));
00180 
00181   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "mutex:create", 
00182                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_mutex_create,NULL));
00183   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "mutex:lock", 
00184                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_mutex_lock,NULL));
00185   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "mutex:trylock", 
00186                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_mutex_trylock,NULL));
00187   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "mutex:unlock", 
00188                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_mutex_unlock,NULL));
00189 
00190   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "condition:create", 
00191                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_condition_create,NULL));
00192   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "condition:wait", 
00193                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_condition_wait,NULL));
00194   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "condition:signal", 
00195                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_condition_signal,NULL));
00196   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "condition:broadcast", 
00197                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_condition_broadcast,NULL));
00198 
00199   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "channel:create", 
00200                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_channel_create,NULL));
00201   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "channel:read", 
00202                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_channel_read,NULL));
00203   dfsch_define_cstr(ctx, "channel:write", 
00204                    dfsch_make_primitive(&native_channel_write,NULL));
00205 
00206   dfsch_provide(ctx, "threads");
00207 
00208   return NULL;
00209 }
